title: Artificial Intelligence Practical Competency Enhancement: Responsible AI Integration Strategies in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more key applications and potential risks of AI in medical education.
Learners can analyze the impact of AI dependency on instructional autonomy and educational ethics from two perspectives.
Learners can design a three-stage (introduction-evaluation-improvement) sustainable AI integration strategy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
